div.p:
Agreement
entered into this eighth day of Septh. 1865, between
Mr. Tookchai of Ora, Nagasaki Merchants of the
one part and Messrs L. Kniffler + Co of Desima
Nagasaki, Merchants, of the other part
The said Kniffler + Co. hereby contract
and agree to sell to the said Tookchai
three thousand piculs No 1 best long Seaweed
on the following terms.
Messrs L. Kniffler + Co. shall with all
convenient speed, despatch the Br British ; Brig
Wm Cundall to Hakodade, where the
vessel shall receive a cargo of three thousand
piculs seaweed as aforesaid and being so
loaded shall proceed to the port of Shanghai
and then deliver the same to said Tookchai
or his Agents.
Four working days being allowed,
the vessel to discharge said Cargo and
such days to commence 24 hours after
notice has been given that the vessel
is ready to discharge. Fourty mex. dollars
to be paid by said Tookchai for every
laydays used in excess. Freight and
Insurance to be provided by said Kniffler + Co
and all other charges to be borne by said
Tookchai
The Seaweed to be weight on

board an taken from alongside the
vessel on the said Tookchai_s risk
and account
In consideration of the above the
said Tookchai hereby agrees to pay for the
said threethousand piculs No1 best long
seaweed at the rate of $ 4 perpicul and shall
have the option of paying same either in
Shanghai upon true and proper delivery
of the cargo there in clean mex: dollars or
in ten days sight draft of Messrs
Glover + Co on Nagasaki at 1% discount
In the event of there being any
dispute as to the quality of the seaweed on
arrival at Shanghai, the matter shall be
referred to arbitrators, chosen by both
parties, whose decision shall be final
Should the seaweed turn out to
be inferior quality or should no No 1
seaweed be obtainable at Hakodade or
should the vessel not reach her destination
then in all and such cases this agree-
ment shall be considered canncelled
In the event of the cargo becoming
damaged in any way in course of transit
from Hakodade to Shanghai, the
buyer shall only be banned to receive
the same portion
It is moreover agreed that the
said Kniffler + Co shall have the
option of shipping a full Cargo in the
Brit. British Brig Wm Cundall + of despatching
the said vessel to Nagasaki before procee..
ding to Shanghai and may discharge
at the former port the whole or any
portion of their part of the cargo, but in
such case the vessel shall not be allowed
to stop at Nagasaki longer than eight
days, otherwise the said Tookchai shall
have the option of cancelling this
agreement
Nagasaki 8th Septh 1865
ppa per procura autoritate Kniffler & Co.
